headline.main: Famine-Hit South Sudan Sharply Raises Foreigners' Work Fees
headline.print_headline: Famine-Hit South Sudan Sharply Raises Foreigners' Work Fees

lead_paragraph: South Sudan has sharply increased the fees required for foreigners to work in the country — from roughly $100 to up to $10,000 — just days after famine was declared there.
snippet: South Sudan has sharply increased the fees required for foreigners to work in the country — from roughly $100 to up to $10,000 — just days after famine was declared there....
